metatags.og:title: Donkey and Mule Soldiers: The Unsung Heroes - Photorientalist
metatags.og:description: By Norbert Schiller Photographs and Illustration from my personal collection. Before donkeys and mules partnered up with armies around the world, other animals were used for that purpose. The first record of canines used in battle goes back to the 6th century BC when trained attack dogs fought alongside soldiers defending the Kingdom of Lydia, ... [Read more...]
